commit.message:
configure, config.in: Rebuilt.

	* configure, config.in: Rebuilt.
	* configure.in: Check for iconv.h.  Define _XOPEN_SOURCE.

From-SVN: r36448

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2000-09-15  Tom Tromey  <tromey@cygnus.com>
+
+	* configure, config.in: Rebuilt.
+	* configure.in: Check for iconv.h.  Define _XOPEN_SOURCE.
+
 2000-09-15  Greg McGary  <greg@mcgary.org>
 
 	* cppmacro.c (check_trad_stringification): Check token

@@ -231,6 +231,9 @@
 /* Define if you have the <fcntl.h> header file.  */
 #undef HAVE_FCNTL_H
 
+/* Define if you have the <iconv.h> header file.  */
+#undef HAVE_ICONV_H
+
 /* Define if you have the <langinfo.h> header file.  */
 #undef HAVE_LANGINFO_H
 
@@ -331,6 +334,9 @@
 /* Define if you can safely include both <string.h> and <strings.h>. */
 #undef STRING_WITH_STRINGS
 
+/* Always define this */
+#undef _XOPEN_SOURCE
+
 /* Define if you have a working <inttypes.h> header file. */
 #undef HAVE_INTTYPES_H

@@ -2162,7 +2162,7 @@ fi
 for ac_hdr in limits.h stddef.h string.h strings.h stdlib.h time.h \
 		 fcntl.h unistd.h stab.h sys/file.h sys/time.h \
 		 sys/resource.h sys/param.h sys/times.h sys/stat.h \
-		 direct.h malloc.h langinfo.h
+		 direct.h malloc.h langinfo.h iconv.h
 do
 ac_safe=`echo "$ac_hdr" | sed 'y%./+-%__p_%'`
 echo $ac_n "checking for $ac_hdr""... $ac_c" 1>&6
@@ -2273,11 +2273,18 @@ have_pthread_h=
 fi
 
 
+# Always define _XOPEN_SOURCE.  It doesn't hurt, and it lets us
+# pick up CODESET from langinfo.h, among other things.
+cat >> confdefs.h <<\EOF
+#define _XOPEN_SOURCE 1
+EOF
+
+
 # See if GNAT has been installed
 # Extract the first word of "gnatbind", so it can be a program name with args.
 set dummy gnatbind; ac_word=$2
 echo $ac_n "checking for $ac_word""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2281: checking for $ac_word" >&5
+echo "configure:2288: checking for $ac_word" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'ac_cv_prog_gnat'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -2316,7 +2323,7 @@ else
   # Extract the first word of "makeinfo", so it can be a program name with args.
 set dummy makeinfo; ac_word=$2
 echo $ac_n "checking for $ac_word""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2320: checking for $ac_word" >&5
+echo "configure:2327: checking for $ac_word" >&5

   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
@@ -2345,13 +2352,13 @@ fi
 if test -n "$MAKEINFO"; then
   # Found it, now check the version.
   echo $ac_n "checking for modern makeinfo""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2349: checking for modern makeinfo" >&5
+echo "configure:2356: checking for modern makeinfo" >&5
 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'gcc_cv_prog_makeinfo_modern'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
 else
     ac_prog_version=`$MAKEINFO --version 2>&1 |
                    sed -n 's/^.*GNU texinfo.* \([0-9][0-9.]*\).*$/\1/p'`
-  echo "configure:2355: version of makeinfo is $ac_prog_version" >&5
+  echo "configure:2362: version of makeinfo is $ac_prog_version" >&5
   case $ac_prog_version in
     '')     gcc_cv_prog_makeinfo_modern=no;;
     3.1[2-9] | 3.[2-9][0-9] | 4.* | 1.6[89] | 1.7[0-9])
@@ -2384,12 +2391,12 @@ fi
 
 
 echo $ac_n "checking for preprocessor stringizing operator""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2388: checking for preprocessor stringizing operator" >&5
+echo "configure:2395: checking for preprocessor stringizing operator" >&5

   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6

   cat > conftest.$ac_ext <<EOF

+#line 2400 "configure"
 #include "confdefs.h"

-echo "configure:2426: checking for inttypes.h" >&5

   rm -rf conftest*

-echo "configure:2464: checking for unsigned enumerated bitfields" >&5
